name: XRP Classic (OLD)
public_notice: XRP Classic (XRPC) has migrated from their older contract to a new one on XRPL. For more information, please view this announcement on Twitter. Visit the new token page here.
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Our Vision
To Create an Innovative, Longstanding Ecosystem That Allows Users To Earn Through An Enjoyable and Memorable Experience.

Our Mission
Is to bring our vision into reality!
